bottlenecks.name: Lack of delegation and automation
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Founder is likely spending too much time on low-value tasks instead of focusing on high-impact activities to drive sales growth.
tactical_fix: Identify tasks that can be delegated or automated
Implement systems and processes to streamline operations

analysis.top_recommendation: Delegate low-value tasks and focus on high-impact sales activities to drive revenue growth.

proposed_kpis.why: To understand the effectiveness of sales efforts in converting leads to customers
To monitor the cost of acquiring new customers and optimize marketing and sales strategies
To measure the ability to retain customers and drive recurring revenue

analysis.summary: To double sales, the founder should prioritize delegation and automation of low-value tasks, focus on high-impact sales activities, and track key metrics like sales conversion rate, CAC, and customer retention rate.

bottlenecks.name: Lack of marketing strategy
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Limited marketing efforts are hindering sales growth

analysis.top_recommendation: Focus on developing and implementing a robust marketing strategy to increase sales

proposed_kpis.why: To measure the effectiveness of marketing efforts
To optimize marketing spend and improve ROI
To ensure long-term customer value and loyalty

analysis.summary: To double sales, prioritize marketing strategy development and implementation to drive revenue growth.

bottlenecks.name: Marketing Strategy
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Lack of effective marketing campaigns to reach target audience
tactical_fix: Collaborate with influencers in health and wellness niche

analysis.top_recommendation: Revamp marketing strategy to increase brand awareness and reach new customers

proposed_kpis.why: To measure the efficiency of marketing campaigns in acquiring new customers
To understand the long-term value of each customer and optimize marketing and sales strategies accordingly
To track the effectiveness of converting leads into paying customers

analysis.summary: To double sales, focus on improving marketing strategies to attract new customers and increase revenue. Track key metrics such as CAC, CLV, and conversion rate to optimize performance.
